title: The Descent
description: The conclusion of Fallen Angel reveals the tragic backstory of the beautiful Mishka and his childhood protector Sergei, who loved him more than life itself and believed his love to be unreturned. No matter how many years stretched out between them, his unrequited love never died. It hid in the darkness of his heart, curled and wounded, but not beaten, waiting for the day when he could finally claim that which he wanted most- Mishka himself- no matter the cost.Descent is the story of how the brightest love turned into the darkest obsession... and how sometimes the best of intentions, can have the worst of consequences. This unique story by best-selling author Amelita Rae is not for everyone. It explores the darkest corners of the human heart and the most twisted versions of love. You will not forget the Fallen Angel.
author: Amelita Rae
